verses.text: \w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w after|strong="H4480"\w* \w Nebuzaradan|strong="H5018"\w* \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w guard|strong="H2876"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w released|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*, \w having|strong="H1961"\w* \w found|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* bound \w in|strong="H3068"\w* chains \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w captives|strong="H1546"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w being|strong="H1961"\w* \w exiled|strong="H1540"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Babylon.

\w The|strong="H3947"\w* \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w guard|strong="H2876"\w* \w found|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w*, “\w The|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w decreed|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w disaster|strong="H7451"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*; \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w just|strong="H1697"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*. \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w happened|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* am \w freeing|strong="H6605"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* chains \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w wrists|strong="H3027"\w*. \w If|strong="H2009"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w pleases|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* Babylon, \w then|strong="H2009"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w take|strong="H7760"\w* \w care|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*. \w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w if|strong="H2009"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w seems|strong="H3605"\w* \w wrong|strong="H7489"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* Babylon, \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w no|strong="H4480"\w* farther. \w Look|strong="H7200"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Wherever|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w seems|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* Jeremiah \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, Nebuzaradan \w added|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w Return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahikam, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, \w whom|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6485"\w* \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w anywhere|strong="H3605"\w* \w else|strong="H5750"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w seems|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3477"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w guard|strong="H2876"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ration \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gift|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w released|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w went|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahikam \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4708"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w him|strong="H7604"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* land. Gedaliah Governs in Judah (2 Kings 25:22–24)

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w armies|strong="H2428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6485"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahikam \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w put|strong="H6485"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w charge|strong="H6485"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w women|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w poorest|strong="H1803"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H6485"\w* \w exiled|strong="H1540"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* Babylon,

\w they|strong="H1992"\w* came \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w at|strong="H1436"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4708"\w*—\w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w*, \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* \w the|strong="H3458"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w*, \w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Tanhumeth|strong="H8576"\w*, \w the|strong="H3458"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ephai|strong="H5778"\w* \w the|strong="H3458"\w* \w Netophathite|strong="H5200"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jezaniah|strong="H3153"\w* \f + \fr 40:8 \ft Jezaniah is a variant of Jaazaniah; see 2 Kings 25:23.\f* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3458"\w* \w Maacathite|strong="H4602"\w*—\w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahikam, \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H3190"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5647"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, assuring \w them|strong="H3190"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H3190"\w* \w not|strong="H3372"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*.\f + \fr 40:9 \ft That is, the Babylonians; also in verse 10\f* \w Live|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* land \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H3190"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w go|strong="H3190"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H5647"\w*.

\w As|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w represent|strong="H5975"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w come|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w*. \w As|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, gather \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* grapes, \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* \w fruit|strong="H7019"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w place|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* storage \w jars|strong="H3627"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H5892"\w* \w taken|strong="H8610"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, Edom, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* lands \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w left|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6485"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahikam, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*,

\w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w places|strong="H4725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w which|strong="H3064"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w had|strong="H3063"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w banished|strong="H5080"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w came|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w at|strong="H7725"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4708"\w*. \w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w gathered|strong="H7235"\w* \w an|strong="H8033"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7235"\w* \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* grapes \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* \w fruit|strong="H7019"\w*. The Plot against Gedaliah

Meanwhile, \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w armies|strong="H2428"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* came \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w at|strong="H1436"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4708"\w*

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* said \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*, “\w Are|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w aware|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Baalis|strong="H1185"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w take|strong="H5221"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*?” \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahikam \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* believe \w them|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3045"\w* \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w* spoke \w privately|strong="H5643"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w at|strong="H6908"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*. “\w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w kill|strong="H5221"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3605"\w* said. “\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w*. \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w take|strong="H5221"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w would|strong="H5315"\w* perish?”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahikam \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*! \w What|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w saying|strong="H1697"\w* \w about|strong="H1697"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lie|strong="H8267"\w*.”
